Class.name: iKnow.SimpleDefinition
Class.Description: Sample implementation of iKnow.SyncedDefinition. See also Keeping your iKnow domain synchronized on the InterSystems Developer Community.

XData.name: Domain
XData.Data: <domain name="Synced Domain"> <parameter name="$$$IKPIGNOREEMPTYBATCH" value="1" /> <data dropBeforeBuild="false"> <table tableName="iKnow.SimpleTable" groupField="'SimpleTable'" idField="%ID" dataFields="SomeText" whereClause="%ID IN (SELECT RecordID FROM iKnow.SyncedDefinitionBatch WHERE DefinitionClass = 'iKnow.SimpleDefinition' AND RecordTable = 'iKnow.SimpleTable')" /> </data> </domain>
